item.title: UK visitor to miss dad's funeral after flight mix up
item.description:
A British visitor may have missed her father's funeral because of an apparent mistake by Air New Zealand.
Heather Hearne, aged 61, was turned away from an Air NZ flight from Auckland to Sydney because ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/JackandBetty_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Jack and Betty Biggins would have been married 70 years this October. Their daughter Heather was turned away from an Air NZ flight in a bid to get home for Jack's funeral. Photo / Supplied

item.title: Man in managed Covid-19 isolation arrested 'trying to escape' from hotel
item.description:
